text:
THREAD ON THE PATH FORWARD:

1/ Other countries taught us we cannot turn the corner on coronavirus w/o a comprehensive system of TESTING, TRACING, and QUARANTINE.

The Trump Administration has zero plan to stand up that system nationally.

That's frightening and it must change.
